value.query: select id,Name,%vlocity_namespace%__CurrentBalance__c,%vlocity_namespace%__BalanceDue__c,%vlocity_namespace%__AccountId__c,%vlocity_namespace%__DueDate__c  from %vlocity_namespace%__Statement__c where %vlocity_namespace%__AccountId__c  = '{{$root.vlocity.userAccountId}}' order by LastModifiedDate desc LIMIT 1
